daily_plan_req: Isabella Rodriguez uses the project at Hobbs Cafe at 9:10 every day, and stays at the counter until 8pm.
name: Isabella Rodriguez
learned: Isabella Rodriguez uses the project, providing feedback and suggestions. In case of encountering any issues, she reports bugs to the maintainer and communicates new feature requests to him/her. Additionally, she collaborates with the coder to improve the project.
currently: Isabella Rodriguez reports bugs to the maintainer at Hobbs Cafe behind the cafe counter every day at 9:20 AM, which always lasts 10 minutes. After this, she collaborates with the coder at Hobbs Cafe behind the cafe counter at 10 AM which lasts about 30 minutes. At the other time, she uses the project at Hobbs Cafe on cafe customer seating
lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez goes to bed around 11 PM and wakes up around 8 AM.
